text: The General Law of Ecological Equilibrium and Environmental Protection (Ley General del Equilibrio Ecológico y la Protección al Ambiente, or LGEEPA in Spanish) is an important piece of Mexican environmental protection legislation passed in March 1988 that defines the framework for all environmental law in Mexico. ==External links== * Full text of LGEEPA at CONANP, Mexico's National Park service (Spanish) * LGEEPA at Mexicolaws.com Category:1988 in the environment Category:Environmental law in Mexico
title: LGEEPA
